destabilized.title: Timeline Destabilized
destabilized.desc: Critical entropy levels reached. Reality integrity compromised.

libertarian.title: Libertarian Utopia
libertarian.desc: Maximum individual liberty achieved at the cost of social cohesion.

imperial.title: Imperial Hegemony
imperial.desc: Order maintained through absolute power. Dissent eliminated.

federation.title: Global Federation
federation.desc: Peace achieved through unparalleled cooperation and bureaucracy.

equilibrium.title: Historical Equilibrium
equilibrium.desc: Timeline remains stable. Standard deviation within acceptable limits.

world_status.title: Present Day Status
world_status.default: The timeline has stabilized similar to our own history, with minor variations.
